description: Applications that collect data from RSS-compliant sites are called RSS readers or "aggregators."  RSSOwl is such an application. RSSOwl lets you gather, organize, update, and store information from any compliant source in a convenient, easy to use interface, save selected information in various formats for offline viewing and sharing, and much more. It's easy to configure and the best of all: It's platform-independent.
summary: RSSOwl is a free and powerful news feed reader
author: Benjamin Pasero
